title: After a Decade of Explosive Scoring, NFL Defenses Are Back on Top
description: Scoring reached a five-year low through the first half of the 2022 season as defenses focused on stopping ‘Mahomsian’ plays.
dc:creator: Emmanuel Morgan

media:content.media:credit: Troy Taormina/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:content.media:description: Eagles safety C.J. Gardner-Johnson has a league-high five interceptions through the season’s first half.
